data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Iași.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Iași, Romania
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Iași, Romania from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.section_summary: On average, 102 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Iași, Romania.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Father, convict the 50,112 believers in Iași to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
Father, please raise up every one you have called in Iași, Romania to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Bashkir people.
Father, your Word can be a lamp to the feet of the 691,361 people in the state of Iași who claim to know you, if they open it and read it today.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 741,589 lost in Iași that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Iași, Romania.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

location.name: Iași
location.people_groups_list: Tatar, Crimean, Uzbek, Northern, Turk, Chinese, general, Jew, Eastern Yiddish-speaking
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Tatar, Crimean (18,000), Uzbek, Northern (1,300), Turk (25,000), Chinese, general (10,000), Jew, Eastern Yiddish-speaking (600)
